name: Phil (The Puppet Mini-Games)
description:
Phil is a short, pixelated and old retro style horror game. The premise of the game is very simple. You get home, the fuse box short circuits and you have to fix it. The game was just made for fun, something to enjoy and a small project I had an especially fun time making. The real question though, is if this game is really a horror game. 

Maybe it's something else.
